title: Restaurant Server
description: Assist customers with orders and serve food efficiently. Maintain cleanliness in the dining area and provide friendly service.

title: Barista
description: Prepare and serve coffee and beverages. Ensure cleanliness of work area and provide excellent customer experience.

title: Software Intern
description: Work alongside senior developers to build, test, and debug applications. Gain hands-on experience in real-world software projects.

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Assist in building responsive websites, fixing bugs, and contributing to frontend and backend tasks.

title: Cashier
description: Handle customer payments, operate POS systems, and maintain accurate cash records. Provide friendly and efficient checkout service.

title: Store Assistant
description: Assist customers, restock shelves, and maintain store cleanliness and organization.

title: Delivery Rider
description: Deliver customer orders quickly and safely. Ensure excellent customer service and timely handling of deliveries.

title: Warehouse Assistant
description: Help manage stock, assist in packing, and support logistics staff in daily warehouse operations.

title: Tutor
description: Provide tutoring in mathematics and science for high school students. Prepare lesson plans and track student progress.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Support teachers in managing classrooms, preparing materials, and assisting students with learning tasks.
